Description: centos_7_autorecovery.json - AutoRecovery EC2 Instance. **WARNING** You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.

InternalRecordName.Description: Record Name for the new Resource Record in the Internal Hosted Zone

ARInstanceSecurityGroupList.Description: A list that contains the EC2 security groups to assign to the Amazon EC2 instance

Environment.Description: Application environment for which this network is being created. e.g. Development/Production.

CwCpuHighOperator.Description: Math operator used by CloudWatch for alarms and triggers.

CwCpuHighThreshold.Description: The value against which the specified statistic is compared.

CWLogRetention.Description: The number of days to retain Cloudwatch Logs for this instance.

Ebs2VolumeSize.Description: Select Second EBS Volume Size in GB.

ImageId.Description: The image ID to be used to build the EC2 Instance. OPTIONAL

IopsVolume2.Description: IOPS value required for use with io1 on secondary EBS volumes. This value should be 3 times the secondary EBS volume size

KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.
KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances.

EIPAllocationId.Description: The AllocationId of the EIP you want to associate with the instance (optional).

CwCpuHighPeriod.Description: Time the specified statistic is applied. Must be in seconds that is also a multiple of 60.

SnapshotId.Description: The Snapshot ID to be used to build the 2nd EBS volume. OPTIONAL

BackupsEnabled.Description: Value of the 'Backup' tag, used to assign the EBSSnapper configuration.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type. Default is t2.micro

EbsVolumeSize.Description: Select EBS Volume Size in GB.

PlacementTenancy.Description: The placement tenancy for EC2 devices

InstanceRoleManagedPolicyArns.Description: A comma delimited list of IAM policy ARNs for the InstanceRole IAM role.  IAM ARNs can be found within the Policies section of the AWS IAM console.

NotificationTopic.Description: SNS Topic ARN to notify if there are any alarms. OPTIONAL

Ebs2MountPoint.Description: Filesystem Mount point for 2nd EBS volume.  Omit to prevent changes to 2nd volume.

PatchingGroupTag.Description: Group ID to be used by System Manager for Patching (OPTIONAL)

SSMInventoryTag.Description: Determines whether Instance is tracked via System Manager Inventory.

T2UnlimitedMode.Description: Determines whether to enable the T2 Unlimited feature.  Only applicable on instance classes that support burstable CPU.

CreationPolicyTimeOut.ConstraintDescription: #H#M#S where each # is the number of hours or minutes or seconds
CreationPolicyTimeOut.Description: Time to wait for the number of signals for the creation policy. H/M/S Hours/Minutes/Seconds

Iops.Description: Iops value required for use with io1 EBS volumes. This value should be 3 times the EBS volume size

CwCpuHighEvaluations.Description: The number of periods over which data is compared to the specified threshold.

DisableApiTermination.Description: Specifies whether the instance can be terminated through the API.

InternalZoneId.Description: The Route53 Internal Hosted Zone ID

EncryptEBSVolume.Description: Specifies whether to encrypt the EBS volume.

Fn::Join: pip install --upgrade awscli pystache argparse python-daemon requests
tar -xvpf aws-cfn-bootstrap-latest.tar.gz && cd aws-cfn-bootstrap-*/ && python setup.py build && python setup.py install

[cfn-auto-reloader-hook]
triggers=post.update
path=Resources.ARInstance.Metadata.AWS::CloudFormation::Init
action=/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -v --configsets Update --stack {{ StackName }} --resource ARInstance --region {{ Region }}
runas=root

[cfn-ebs-hook]
triggers=post.update,post.add
path=Resources.Ebs2VolumeAttachment.PhysicalResourceId
action=/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -v --configsets Ebsformat --stack {{ StackName }} --resource ARInstance --region {{ Region }}
runas=root

/var/log/sftd.log {
    missingok
    weekly
    copytruncate
    rotate 4
    compress
    postrotate
      service sftd restart
    endscript
}

n=0
while :
do
  yum install -y -q scaleft-server-tools
  [[ $? = 0 ]] && break || ((n++))
  (( n >= 5 )) && break
done

Properties.AlarmDescription: Status checks have failed for system, generating ticket.
Status checks have failed, rebooting system.
Status checks have failed, generating ticket.
Status checks have failed for system, recovering instance
